confirmed_facts: Arirang 7 satellite will launch on 2025-12-02 at 02:21 local time from Kourou, French Guiana
Arirang 7 will be launched aboard an ArianeSpace Vega-C rocket
Arirang 7 is a 30â€¯cm highâ€‘resolution optical Earth observation satellite
Arirang 7 will enter a target orbit and undergo ~6 months of commissioning before full operation in early 2026
Arirang 7 was developed domestically starting in Augustâ€¯2016 and completed after ~9 years
Arirang 7 carries a highâ€‘precision attitude control system (CMG) and >1â€¯TB storage for imagery
